mapper.insert: INSERT into teacher (name, num, college_id, telphone, id_card_no, gender, account, password, course_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{num}, #{collegeId}, #{telphone}, #{idCardNo}, #{gender}, #{account}, #{password}, #{courseId})
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.num, c.name AS collegeName, t.telphone, t.id_card_no, t.course_id, (SELECT name FROM course WHERE id = t.course_id) AS courseName, CASE gender WHEN 0 THEN "男" ELSE "女" END AS genderName, t.account FROM teacher AS t JOIN college AS c ON t.college_id = c.id
mapper.delete: UPDATE teacher SET name = #{name}, num = #{num}, college_id = #{collegeId}, telphone = #{telphone}, id_card_no = #{idCardNo}, gender = #{gender}, account = #{account}, password = #{password}, course_id = #{courseId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM teacher WHERE account = #{account} AND password = #{password}
